tool_description: All-in-one global package tracking tool. Support track and trace international 472 couriers.
name: TrackingMore_v2
title: TrackingMore

api_list.name: carriers/list
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://trackingmore.p.rapidapi.com/carriers/list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "trackingmore.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://trackingmore.p.rapidapi.com/carriers/list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "trackingmore.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

utterances.utterance: Can you show me a list of all the supported carriers?
I need to know which carriers are supported by your tracking service.
Please provide a list of all international couriers you support.
What are the names of the carriers that your tool can track?
Could you give me a list of all the couriers available for tracking?
List all the package carriers that are supported by this tool.
I want to see all the carriers that can be tracked using this service.
Show me the complete list of supported package carriers.
Can you list all the couriers that your service can track?
What carriers does your tracking tool support?

api_list.name: packages/track (Deprecated)
api_list.description: Get tracking information of specific package

parameters.name: carrierCode
parameters.description: Carrier code gotten from .../carriers/list or carriers/detect endpoint

utterances.utterance: Can you track my package with carrier code 'fedex' and tracking number '1234567890'?
